snippet.title: Underhero - 2017 Trailer
snippet.description:
Join Elizabeth IV and a little Masked kid in a journey across the Chestnut Kingdom to once again, defeat the evil Mr. Stitches! 
Meet friends, foes and other weird characters in the mysterious world of Underhero.

...Wait, once again!?

A video game inspired by Paper Mario games and other Nintendo RPGs. You can explore, solve puzzles and fight with our very own turn-based combat with a twist: there are no turns!
All you have is your reflexes and your timing. We call it timing-based combat! 

Follow Underhero at:

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/573320/Underhero/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Underherodevs

Devblog: https://underherodevs.tumblr.com/

Website: http://underherogame.com/

Discord: https://discord.gg/ukNrGV5

Background Artwork by:

Andrea Gallo - https://twitter.com/ai_gallo

Musical score composed by:

Stijn Van Wakeren - http://stijnvanwakeren.com/
